unnormalised: It was a somber day at the National Defence Academy as they bid farewell to Lt. Gen. Rakesh Sharma, who retired after 35 yrs of distinguished service. The ceremony took place on 12/12/2024, marked by a parade and speeches honoring his contributions.
normalised: It was a somber day at the N-D-A as they bid farewell to Lieutenant General Rakesh Sharma, who retired after thirty five years of distinguished service. The ceremony took place on twelfth December two thousand and twenty four, marked by a parade and speeches honoring his contributions.

unnormalised: Gen. Sharma, an alumnus of the NDA himself, had served in various operational roles, including a stint at the Siachen Glacier. His colleagues remember him as a leader par excellence, always putting his men first. He was known for his strategic thinking and meticulous planning.
normalised: General Sharma, an alumnus of the N-D-A himself, had served in various operational roles, including a stint at the Siachen Glacier. His colleagues remember him as a leader par excellence, always putting his men first. He was known for his strategic thinking and meticulous planning.

unnormalised: During his tenure as the GOC-in-C of the Western Command, he oversaw numerous successful operations along the border. His leadership during the Kargil conflict earned him the Vir Chakra.
normalised: During his tenure as the G-O-C-in-C of the Western Command, he oversaw numerous successful operations along the border. His leadership during the Kargil conflict earned him the Vir Chakra.

unnormalised: The parade saw participation from cadets of all three services – Army, Navy, and Air Force. The event was also attended by several retired officers, including Maj. Gen. (Retd.) V.K. Mathur, who had mentored Gen. Sharma during his early years in the army.

unnormalised: Addressing the cadets, Gen. Sharma emphasized the importance of discipline, integrity, and unwavering commitment to the nation. He also urged them to embrace technological advancements and adapt to the changing nature of warfare.

unnormalised: “The nation looks up to you for its security,” he said. “Never let it down.” He also expressed his gratitude to his family for their support throughout his career. His wife, Mrs. Priya Sharma, was present at the ceremony.

unnormalised: He will be succeeded by Lt. Gen. Aditya Verma, who takes charge on 01/01/2025. Gen. Verma is a highly decorated officer and is expected to continue the legacy of excellence at the Western Command.

unnormalised: The farewell concluded with a traditional 'bara khana' where officers and their families shared a meal and reminisced about Gen. Sharma's illustrious career. His service is a reminder to us all of the dedication and sacrifice of those in uniform. It was truly an end of an era, and the beginning of a new chapter.
